meanings.definition: In a manner related to magnetostriction.
meanings.sent1: The machine hummed magnetostrictively as it converted magnetic energy.
meanings.sent2: She adjusted the settings magnetostrictively to optimize performance.
meanings.sent3: The robot danced magnetostrictively to the rhythm of the magnetic field.
meanings.sent4: The music flowed magnetostrictively through the speakers, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent5: The wind whispered magnetostrictively through the trees, creating an eerie atmosphere.

meanings.sent3: The magnetostrictively enhanced gloves made him feel like a superhero.
